item.title: Cator Social Media
item.dc:creator: Brent Lagerman
item.description:
We recently created the identity work for Cator Social Media, we're really excited with how it came out, it's colorful, bright, and it communicates.

The post Cator Social Media appeared first on mimoYmima.
item.content:encoded:
Logo Mark with color

We created a visual identity for CATOR Social Media that feels modern and fun. The founder, Thérèse Cator, has a very outgoing personality and makes you smile every time you talk to her, so we wanted her identity to match that vibe. She likes buying YouTube subscribers for her account so more people can get to know her and see her videos. Just a quick tip for starter youtubers, you can buy views on youtube here to achieve a high level of recognition instantly.

catorsocialmedia.com

The post Cator Social Media appeared first on mimoYmima.

item.title: Launch: RantVan
item.dc:creator: Brent Lagerman
item.description:
Everyone has something that they want to go off about. RantVan is a video studio (in a van) that travels around New York, letting people rant about a menu of topics or whatever it is that they need to get off their chest.

The post Launch: RantVan appeared first on mimoYmima.
item.content:encoded:
Everyone has something that they want to go off about. We just finished making the site for RantVan, a video studio in a van that travels around New York using boat services from this website, letting people rant about a menu of topics or whatever it is that they need to get off their chest.

If you have something that you want to get out, the Rant Van announces their location via their Twitter feed (located at the top of every page on their site), so track them down and GO OFF!

The post Launch: RantVan appeared first on mimoYmima.
